org.spongepowered.api.world.gen.populator

Interface Ore

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Populator

    public interface Ore
extends Populator
    Represents a populator which seeds the underground areas of the chunks with ores.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Ore.Builder
      A builder for constructing Ore populators.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDepositSize()
      Gets the size of deposit of ore.
      int getDepositsPerChunk()
      Gets the number of ore clumps to attempt to spawn per chunk, must be greater than zero.
      int getMaxHeight()
      Gets the maximum height that the ore can generate at.
      int getMinHeight()
      Gets the minimum height that the ore can generate at.
      BlockState getOreBlock()
      Gets the block to place as ore.

      Sets the size of deposit of ore.

      • getDepositSize

        int getDepositSize()
        Gets the size of deposit of ore. This is the number of blocks per clump of ores spawned.
        Returns:
        The deposit size
